title: Medieval History 101 Episode VI
author: VD
content_html:
What if you were told that without the Rule of St. Benedict for monks there would be no Western civilization? Hint: It isn’t because monks were not supposed to laugh. For Unauthorized subscribers.

Episode 6: Getting Medieval on the Rule of St. Benedict

Episode Guide
